short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly download TikTok videos without watermark in bulk. Save your TikTok best memories or inspirations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
__________ English __________
Tik Downloader a powerful Chrome extension that makes it easy to download your favorite TikTok videos with or without watermark. Whether you're a content creator, a social media manager, or just a fan of TikTok, our extension allows you to save videos for offline viewing or to use in your own campaigns.

Unleash your TikTok branding potential or save life memories for the price of a coffee per month ‚òïüòâ !

Features :
    Free version :
         - Download 5 free-watermark video per day
         - Download bulk videos from profile (10, 25 or all)
         - Download up to 10 videos manually from profile
         - Download individual videos from all pages
    Pro version :
         - Download unlimited videos without watermarks
         - Unlimited manual selection of videos from profile
         - Access to upcoming features like : ZIP format download, custom bulk downloads,...
         - Includes all free version features

Getting started is easy:
  1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
  2. Open a TikTok page
  3. Use the download buttons to select videos or use bulk download option on a profile page
  4. Upgrade to the Pro version to unlock additional features

To access PRO features:
  1. Open a TikTok page.
  2. Open the Tik Downloader pop-up by clicking on the "TikDownloader Settings" on the right bottom of the page (OR accessible through the extension button with the puzzle logo in the navbar).
  3. On the home page or account page, click the "Unlock Pro" button.
  4. Subscribe to the membership on the Gumroad apge and you will receive a license key via email.
  5. Return to the Tik Downloader pop-up and enter your license key in the form on the account page.  Then, click "Activate".
  6. Your license key will be verified and you will have access to the pro features. Enjoy!

Need help ? : 
  Contact us at tiktoksave.assistance@gmail.com with any questions or suggestions to improve the extension.

Disclaimer :
  - Disclaimer 1: This extension is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by TikTok.
  - Disclaimer 2: To use Tik Downloader in compliance with TikTok's terms and conditions of sale, please refer to the Chrome Web Store product page for the Tik Downloader terms and conditions of sale.
